verses.verse: And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%> to his mother's relatives, <S%H251><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them and to the whole <S%H3605><s%> clan <S%H4940><s%> of the household <S%H1004><s%> of his mother's father, saying, <S%H1><s%>

"Speak, <S%H1696><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> 'Which <S%H4100><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> for you, that seventy <S%H7657><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over you, or <S%H518><s%> that one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over you?' Also, remember <S%H2142><s%> that I am your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>"

And his mother's relatives <S%H251><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> on his behalf <S%H5921><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and they were inclined <S%H5186><s%> to follow <S%H310><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> "He is our relative. <S%H251><s%>"

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> him seventy <S%H7657><s%> [pieces] of silver <S%H3701><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baal-berith with which <S%H1992><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> worthless <S%H7386><s%> and reckless <S%H6348><s%> fellows, <S%H376><s%> and they followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

Then he went <S%H935><s%> to his father's house <S%H1004><s%> at Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone. <S%H68><s%> But Jotham <S%H3147><s%> the youngest <S%H9512><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> was left, <S%H3498><s%> for he hid <S%H2244><s%> himself.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Beth-millo assembled <S%H622><s%> together, and they went <S%H1980><s%> and made <S%H4427><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4428><s%> by the oak <S%H436><s%> of the pillar <S%H5324><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

Now when they told <S%H5046><s%> Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> he went <S%H1980><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> out. Thus he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, O men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> may listen <S%H8085><s%> to you.

"Once <S%H1980><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> forth <S%H1980><s%> to anoint <S%H4886><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and they said <S%H559><s%> to the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, <S%H2132><s%> 'Reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us!'

"But the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree <S%H2132><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Shall I leave <S%H2308><s%> my fatness <S%H1880><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and men <S%H376><s%> are honored, <S%H3513><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%>?'
"Then the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree, <S%H8384><s%> 'You come, <S%H1980><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us!'

"But the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree <S%H8384><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Shall I leave <S%H2308><s%> my sweetness <S%H4987><s%> and my good <S%H2896><s%> fruit, <S%H8570><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%>?'
"Then the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> 'You come, <S%H1980><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us!'

"But the vine <S%H1612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Shall I leave <S%H2308><s%> my new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> which cheers <S%H8055><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and men, <S%H376><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%>?'
"Finally all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the bramble, <S%H329><s%> 'You come, <S%H1980><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us!'

"And the bramble <S%H329><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the trees, <S%H6086><s%> 'If <S%H518><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> you are anointing <S%H4886><s%> me as king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, come <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in my shade; <S%H6738><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> not, may fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out from the bramble <S%H329><s%> and consume <S%H398><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>'

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, if <S%H518><s%> you have dealt <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and integrity <S%H8549><s%> in making <S%H4427><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4427><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H9186><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house, <S%H1004><s%> and have dealt <S%H6213><s%> with him as he deserved <S%H1576><s%> <S%H3027><s%> –
for my father fought <S%H1><s%> for you and risked <S%H3898><s%> <S%H7993><s%> his life <S%H5048><s%> and delivered <S%H5315><s%> you from the hand <S%H5337><s%> of Midian; <S%H3027><s%>

but you have risen <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> my father's house <S%H1004><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> and have killed <S%H2026><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> and have made <S%H4427><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he is your relative <S%H251><s%> –

if <S%H518><s%> then you have dealt <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and integrity <S%H8549><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and let him also <S%H1571><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in you.

"But if <S%H518><s%> not, let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out from Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and consume <S%H398><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and Beth-millo; and let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> out from the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and from Beth-millo, and consume <S%H398><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>"

Then Jotham <S%H3147><s%> escaped <S%H5127><s%> and fled, <S%H1272><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Beer <S%H876><s%> and remained <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>
Now Abimelech <S%H40><s%> ruled <S%H8323><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> dealt <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Abimelech, <S%H40><s%>

in order that the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the seventy <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> might come, <S%H935><s%> and their blood <S%H1818><s%> might be laid <S%H7760><s%> on Abimelech <S%H40><s%> their brother, <S%H251><s%> who <S%H834><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> them, and on the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> who <S%H834><s%> strengthened <S%H2388><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> men in ambush <S%H693><s%> against him on the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they robbed <S%H1497><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> might pass <S%H5674><s%> by them along the road; <S%H1870><s%> and it was told <S%H5046><s%> to Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

Now Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his relatives, <S%H251><s%> and crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> into Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> put <S%H982><s%> their trust <S%H982><s%> in him.

And they went <S%H3318><s%> out into the field <S%H7704><s%> and gathered <S%H1219><s%> [the grapes of] their vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and trod <S%H1869><s%> [them,] and held <S%H6213><s%> a festival; <S%H1974><s%> and they went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of their god, <S%H430><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> and drank <S%H8354><s%> and cursed <S%H7043><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

Then Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> is Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? Is he not the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> and [is] Zebul <S%H2083><s%> [not] his lieutenant <S%H6496><s%>? Serve <S%H5647><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father of Shechem; <S%H1><s%> but why <S%H7927><s%> should we serve <S%H4069><s%> him?

"Would, <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> therefore, that this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> were under my authority! <S%H3027><s%> Then I would remove <S%H5493><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>" And he said <S%H559><s%> to Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> "Increase <S%H7235><s%> your army, <S%H6635><s%> and come <S%H3318><s%> out."

And when Zebul <S%H2083><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed, <S%H5651><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> burned. <S%H2734><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> deceitfully, <S%H8649><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> to Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are stirring <S%H6696><s%> up the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, arise <S%H6965><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> you and the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with you, and lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> is up, that you shall rise <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> and rush <S%H6584><s%> upon the city; <S%H5892><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> when he and the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with him come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> you, you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them whatever <S%H9201><s%> you can."

So Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him arose <S%H6965><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> and lay <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in four <S%H702><s%> companies. <S%H7218><s%>

Now Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him arose <S%H6965><s%> from the ambush. <S%H3993><s%>

And when Gaal <S%H1603><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Zebul, <S%H2083><s%> "Look, <S%H2009><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> are coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>" But Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You are seeing <S%H7200><s%> the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> as [if they were] men. <S%H376><s%>"

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> are coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the highest <S%H2872><s%> part <S%H2872><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> company <S%H7218><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the diviners' oak. <S%H436><s%>"

Then Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Where <S%H346><s%> is your boasting <S%H6310><s%> now <S%H645><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you said, <S%H559><s%> 'Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech <S%H40><s%> that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him?' Is this <S%H2088><s%> not the people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you despised <S%H3988><s%>? Go <S%H3318><s%> out now <S%H6258><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with them!"
So Gaal <S%H1603><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> the leaders <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> him, and he fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him; and many <S%H7227><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> wounded <S%H2491><s%> up to the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> at Arumah, <S%H725><s%> but Zebul <S%H2083><s%> drove <S%H1644><s%> out Gaal <S%H1603><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> so <S%H4480><s%> that they could not remain <S%H3427><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about the next <S%H4283><s%> day, <S%H4283><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to the field, <S%H7704><s%> and it was told <S%H5046><s%> to Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

So he took <S%H3947><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> and divided <S%H2673><s%> them into three <S%H7969><s%> companies, <S%H7218><s%> and lay <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> in the field; <S%H7704><s%> when he looked <S%H7200><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> coming <S%H3318><s%> out from the city, <S%H5892><s%> he arose <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them and slew <S%H5221><s%> them.

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the company <S%H7218><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was with him dashed <S%H6584><s%> forward and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> the other two <S%H8147><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%> then dashed <S%H6584><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] in the field <S%H7704><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> them.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> and he captured <S%H3920><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] in it; then he razed <S%H5422><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and sowed <S%H2232><s%> it with salt. <S%H4417><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of [it,] they entered <S%H935><s%> the inner <S%H6877><s%> chamber <S%H6877><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%> of El-berith.
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> were gathered <S%H6908><s%> together.

So Abimelech <S%H40><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zalmon, <S%H6756><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him; and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> an axe <S%H7134><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> down <S%H3772><s%> a branch <S%H9590><s%> from the trees, <S%H6086><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> it and laid <S%H7760><s%> [it] on his shoulder. <S%H7926><s%> Then he said <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him, "What <S%H4100><s%> you have seen <S%H7200><s%> me do, <S%H6213><s%> hurry <S%H4116><s%> [and] do <S%H6213><s%> likewise. <S%H3644><s%>"
